name: Our House of Hope Rescue
description: Our House of Hope Rescue is a wonderful organization that goes beyond simple animal rescue. They strive to build a caring and connected community where people and pets bring out the best in each other. Through their various outreach programs and partnerships, they create hope, healing, and connection for all.
keyImpacts: Bringing seniors together for conversation and animal socialization through their Coffee & Cuddles program.
Supporting domestic violence survivors by providing resources and temporary support for their pets through Bridge of Hope.
Reducing rescue intakes by supplying dog and cat food to low-income families via their Pet Food Pantry.
Offering a safe and peaceful environment for families to train and bond with their dogs at the Center for Enrichment.
Empowering the community through education on responsible pet ownership and animal welfare.
Providing dedicated care and loving retirement homes for beagles retiring from research facilities.
